originalText.text:
Dr Williams saw me on extremely short notice, saw how much pain I was in and got me in the MRI tube same day. By the time I came back upstairs my knee surgery was already scheduled for the following week.

Dr Williams explained everything and made sure I knew exactly what was going on. Day of surgery he was great and I'm writing this review from the treadmill 7 weeks later. Great dude, great experience and great result

originalText.text: Dr. Williams is  the BEST doctor/surgeon/specialist! I went to him with a shoulder condition that would not heal. He truly listened to me, throughly examined me, and gave me 2 possible choices on how to treat my condition. He is personable, thoughtful, and informative. I was well taken care of by his staff and the staff at Hospital for Special Surgery Westside. All of my questions were answered, they took care of my paperwork, and checked in on my to see how I was progressing. I can't recommend Dr. Williams and his staff enough. In the future is I have any shoulder, elbow or knee issues, he will be my first call.

text.text: Dr. Williams is  the BEST doctor/surgeon/specialist! I went to him with a shoulder condition that would not heal. I was well taken care of by his staff and the staff at Hospital for Special Surgery Westside. In the future is I have any shoulder, elbow or knee issues, he will be my first call.

originalText.text: Dr Williams seems to be brilliant and has a tremendous body of work.  His support team is absolutely horrible, sadly.  I received a diagnosis in which the doctor called and advised, after reviewing my MRI, that I needed an additional procedure beyond what we had previously discussed. Naturally, I wanted to know more. I called the office several times and was told the doctor would call me back and that did not happen, despite multiple inquiries on my part. I then curtly expressed how upset I was, given that I was experiencing significant knee pain and, after several weeks, was still unable to speak to the doctor about his diagnosis. I then spoke to a supervisor who said the doctor would call, and he never did.  After a couple more weeks without a response, I then went to another specialist whose office is extremely responsive and who also advised that I didn’t need the more invasive procedures recommended by Dr Williams.  I frankly didn’t want to write this review, but I also sent an extensive email to the doctor describing my less than professional treatment by his office, and still no one responded.  The doctor is brilliant (though perhaps he needlessly recommended more invasive measures for me), but the inability to be able to talk to him about my medical care coupled with dismissive and unprofessional treatment by his office represents the worst medical experience I’ve had in my life.

originalText.text: We had the BEST experience with Dr Williams. He is absolutely brilliant and we had/have full confidence in him. Our son tore his ACL in January 2021 playing lax. Dr Williams repaired his knee in February and under his guidance, our son was in PT almost immediately. Dr Williams really wants to see athletes back in the game as quickly and safely as possible. We appreciated this approach as athletics are very important to our son. HSS monitored our son’s progress as we did PT 3x per week closer to home. Dr Williams has always been patient, kind and extraordinarily knowledgeable. We never felt rushed and he always answered questions in a very honest and candid way. I feel so grateful that Dr Williams was so highly recommended to us and have recommended him a few times to other parents who’s kids have unfortunately had similar injuries. He is just the BEST!

originalText.text: A fantastic experience for shoulder arthroscopy at the Hospital  for Special surgery ambulatory care center! Dr Riley Williams is an amazing surgeon! Both highly skilled and compassionate and attentive to my needs to return back to work and full function. His staff is amazing! So professional and conscientious! a well-oiled machine!!!   The outpatient surgery center is immaculate and the nurses are excellent!  Every part of this experience was great from the front desk staff to the surgical center staff and all of the support staff in the process including his surgical coordinator, Jessica who is so patient and organized and his surgical nurse Liliana who responded to all of my needs.   No need to look further this surgeon is the best!! Thank you for giving my function back! I am grateful!
